data.text:
2024 Football Roster

Choose a Player:

Johnathan Mosley

Position Defensive Back

Height 6-1

Weight 200

Class Senior

Hometown Spencer, Okla.

Highschool Carl Albert

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

Senior defensive back and veteran leader on the backend of the Broncho defense ... Talented defender that can make a play on the ball all over the field ... Is good in coverage over the top and can come up and make a play ... Is a hard-hitting tackler that knows how to get to the ball ... Has played in all 33 games for the Bronchos in three seasons.

2023: Played in 11 games and made four starts for the Bronchos as a junior ... Recorded 47 tackles, which ranked fifth on the team ... Made 25 solo stops and 22 assisted tackles ... Added 1.5 tackles in the backfield ... Led the team with two interceptions ... Broke up four passes ... Career-high seven tackles in Week 11 at Pittsburg State ... Recorded six tackles in a game three times ... Picked off a pass at Northeastern State in Week 8 and returned it for a touchdown ... Also had an interception in Week 10 win against Washburn.

2022: Played in all 11 games for the Bronchos as a sophomore ... Finished the season with 42 tackles, 17 of which were solo stops and 25 assisted tackles ... Had a half-tackle behind the line of scrimmage ... Grabbed one interception on the season and returned it 15 yards ... Had two pass breakups ... Recorded a season-high six tackles in a win over Fort Hays State in Week 7 ... Had five tackles in a game five times, including three consecutive games following the six-tackle game in Week 7 ... Recorded one tackle in every game and multiple tackles in 10 of 11 outings.

2021: Played in all 11 games during freshman season, becoming a regular starter at safety ... Had nine tackles in the first eight games of his career before registering 18 over the final three games of the season ... Finished with 27 tackles on the year ... Made 18 solo stops to go with nine assisted tackles ... Made one tackle behind the line of scrimmage ... Nabbed one interception in Week 10 against Nebraska Kearney ... Had three passes broken up on the year ... Recorded career-high seven tackles in Week 11 at Central Missouri.

2020: Gained a year of experience through practice as Central did not compete due to the pandemic.

High School: Prep standout at Carl Albert High School in Midwest City, Oklahoma ... All-State selection helped team to three consecutive state championships.

Personal: Kinesiology major ... Birthdate is Oct. 31, 2001.
